topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Operating System Kernels :: BSD

name: OpenSOB: Sistema Operativo Bolivariano
short_description: OpenSOB is an UNIX*BSD Operating system based on FreeBSD 5.0-RELEASE. This version of the Operating system goes oriented to improve the impression of the end user when he uses an UNIX*BSD Operating system making some modifications to the Kernel and GUI.
